記住衛報係工黨嘅黨報，因為依家保守黨對香港嘅政策仲係模糊不清，工黨出嚟趁機抽水，所以衛報先會報香港嘅新聞，並唔係真心想幫香港。
記住要話保守黨政府點樣出賣香港人，戴卓爾夫人點點點，BoJo點點點。講幾多香港人慘況係無用架，最緊要鬧保守黨，咁就啱曬衛報口味。

replies.msg:
英文唔好都要盡量寫！寫得出自己最真實嘅感受就ok

俾一堆字大家參考下
- 國安法 National Security Law
-> 分裂國家，顛覆國家政權，恐怖主義，外國干預
secession, subversion, terrorism, foreign intervention
- 廿三條 Article 23
- 中英聯合聲明 Sino-British Joint Declaration
- 集會自由，言論自由 Freedom of assembly, freedom of speech
- 支持民主 Pro-democracy
- 自由 Liberty
- Beijing plans to impose national security legislation on Hong Kong （強加）（另一個講法係Beijing pushes this through）
- Beijing plans to enact the national security law in Hong Kong （頒布）
- This will bypass Hong Kong's legislature （繞過）
- 自主／獨立 autonomous/ independent
- 模糊 Vague
- 沮喪／頹廢 Frustrated
- 悲觀 Pessimistic
- 失望 Disappointed
- 嬲／懊惱 Angry/ Annoyed
- 擔心 worried
- 討厭／嘔心 Disgusted

Don't tell me about the press. I know exactly who reads the papers. The Daily Mirror is read by people who think they run the country; The Guardian is read by people who think they ought to run the country; The Times is read by the people who actually do run the country; the Daily Mail is read by the wives of the people who run the country; the Financial Times is read by people who own the country; the Morning Star is read by people who think the country ought to be run by another country, and the Daily Telegraph is read by people who think it is.
Prime Minister, what about the people who read The Sun?

英文唔好都要盡量寫！寫得出自己最真實嘅感受就ok

俾一堆字大家參考下
- 國安法 National Security Law
-> 分裂國家，顛覆國家政權，恐怖主義，外國干預
secession, subversion, terrorism, foreign intervention
- 廿三條 Article 23
- 中英聯合聲明 Sino-British Joint Declaration
- 集會自由，言論自由 Freedom of assembly, freedom of speech
- 支持民主 Pro-democracy
- 自由 Liberty
- Beijing plans to impose national security legislation on Hong Kong （強加）（另一個講法係Beijing pushes this through）
- Beijing plans to enact the national security law in Hong Kong （頒布）
- This will bypass Hong Kong's legislature （繞過）
- 自主／獨立 autonomous/ independent
- 模糊 Vague
- 沮喪／頹廢 Frustrated
- 悲觀 Pessimistic
- 失望 Disappointed
- 嬲／懊惱 Angry/ Annoyed
- 擔心 worried
- 討厭／嘔心 Disgusted
